references.reason: This paper is foundational to the Learnware paradigm as it provides a benchmark for evaluating the privacy of synthetic data used in the system.
This paper introduces a novel approach for training generative models which is relevant to the generation of synthetic data within the Learnware paradigm.
This paper introduces the concept of Differential Privacy, a core concept for privacy-preserving data sharing which the Learnware system aims to protect.
This paper introduces the Kernel Two-Sample Test which is theoretically relevant to the RKME specification which lies at the core of the learnware system.

references.paper_title: A Hilbert space embedding for distributions
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of Kernel Mean Embedding (KME), a key element of the RKME specification used in the Learnware system to identify and reuse models.
